Name: Loki
Details: Named after the Norse god of deceit, Loki is the special operations unit of the Lyran Intelligence Corps whose main task is to perform the 'dirty deeds' required by the Commonwealth. The current Archon Katrina Steiner was nearly assassinated in 3007 by Loki agents under the orders of her uncle, Alessandro Steiner, the then Archon of the Lyran Commonwealth.
